   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(simple_1_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% COMMON TEST CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   34: %%
   35: %% Info = [tuple()]
   36: %%   List of key/value pairs.
   37: %%
   38: %% Description: Returns list of tuples to set default properties
   39: %%              for the suite.
   40: %%
   41: %% Note: The suite/0 function is only meant to be used to return
   42: %% default data values, not perform any other operations.
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: suite() ->
   45:     [
   46:      {timetrap,{seconds,10}}
   47:     ].
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %%
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   55: %% Reason = term()
   56: %%   The reason for skipping the suite.
   57: %%
   58: %% Description: Initialization before the suite.
   59: %%
   60: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   61: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     [{ips,ips_data} | Config].
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   68: %%
   69: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   70: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   71: %%
   72: %% Description: Cleanup after the suite.
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   75:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config).
   76: 
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   79: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   80: %%
   81: %% TestCase = atom()
   82: %%   Name of the test case that is about to run.
   83: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   84: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   85: %% Reason = term()
   86: %%   The reason for skipping the test case.
   87: %%
   88: %% Description: Initialization before each test case.
   89: %%
   90: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   91: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   94:     [{TestCase,{TestCase,data}} | Config].
   95: 
   96: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   97: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   98: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   99: %%
  100: %% TestCase = atom()
  101: %%   Name of the test case that is finished.
  102: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  103: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  104: %%
  105: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case.
  106: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  107: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  108:     {TestCase,data} = ?config(TestCase, Config).
  109: 
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: %% Function: all() -> TestCases | {skip,Reason}
  112: %%
  113: %% TestCases = [TestCase | {sequence,SeqName}]
  114: %% TestCase = atom()
  115: %%   Name of a test case.
  116: %% SeqName = atom()
  117: %%   Name of a test case sequence.
  118: %% Reason = term()
  119: %%   The reason for skipping all test cases.
  120: %%
  121: %% Description: Returns the list of test cases that are to be executed.
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: all() ->
  124:     [tc1,
  125:      tc2].
  126: 
  127: 
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  129: %% TEST CASES
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: 
  132: tc1() ->
  133:     [{userdata,{info, "This is a testcase"}}].
  134: 
  135: tc1(Config) ->
  136:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config),
  137:     {tc1,data} = ?config(tc1, Config),
  138:     ok.
  139: 
  140: tc2() ->
  141:     [{timetrap,5000}].
  142: 
  143: tc2(Config) ->
  144:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config),
  145:     undefined = ?config(tc1, Config),
  146:     {tc2,data} = ?config(tc2, Config),
  147:     ok.
